function.name: mediaRepeatMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the media repeat mode on a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the media repeat mode.

predefinedMediaRepeatMode.description: The predefined media repeat mode to set.
